remarks: Simplified version of ~ mzpsubst to simply relabel variables in a polynomial.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Oct-2014.)
statement:
mzprename $p |- ( ( W e. _V /\ F e. ( mzPoly ` V ) /\ R : V --> W ) -> ( x e. ( ZZ ^m W ) |-> ( F ` ( x o. R ) ) ) e. ( mzPoly ` W ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d R x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
